ItemType.name: GIAT-Armalite howitzer
ItemType.description: The GIAT-Armalite are light howitzers, they are effective both as artillery and as skirmish weapons.

ItemType.name: GIAT-Armalite fragmenting howitzer
ItemType.description: The GIAT-Armalite are light howitzers, they are effective both as artillery and as skirmish weapons.

ItemType.name: GIAT-Armalite impact howitzer
ItemType.description: The GIAT-Armalite are light howitzers, they are effective both as artillery and as skirmish weapons.

ItemType.description: The GIAT-Armalite are light howitzers, they are effective both as artillery and as skirmish weapons.

ItemType.name: Barrett heavy Morningstar
ItemType.description: Barrett's Morningstar cannon is a highly improved version of the spread cannon NAMI PK25 Morningstar.

ItemType.name: Barrett piercing Morningstar
ItemType.description: Barrett's Morningstar cannon is a highly improved version of the spread cannon NAMI PK25 Morningstar.

ItemType.name: Barrett carbide Morningstar
ItemType.description: Barrett's Morningstar cannon is a highly improved version of the spread cannon NAMI PK25 Morningstar.

ItemType.name: Barrett momentum Morningstar
ItemType.description: Barrett's Morningstar cannon is a highly improved version of the spread cannon NAMI PK25 Morningstar.

ItemType.name: Grendel Coilgun
ItemType.description: Grendel are manifacturing coilguns from over 300 years. This magnetic driven cannon is an alternative to the NAMI recoilless technology.

ItemType.name: Grendel Light Coilgun
ItemType.description: Grendel are manifacturing coilguns from over 300 years. This magnetic driven cannon is an alternative to the NAMI recoilless technology.

ItemType.name: Grendel Heavy Coilgun
ItemType.description: Grendel are manifacturing coilguns from over 300 years. This magnetic driven cannon is an alternative to the NAMI recoilless technology.

ItemType.name: Grendel Gauss Gun
ItemType.description: Grendel Gauss Guns are an improved version of the Coilguns. The manifacturer is trying everything to force its own technology on the market.

ItemType.name: Grendel Heavy Gauss Gun
ItemType.description: Grendel Gauss Guns are an improved version of the Coilguns. The manifacturer is trying everything to force its own technology on the market.

ItemType.name: Grendel Autocannon
ItemType.description: The Grendel Autocannon is top of the line Grendel Firearms technology. This thermo cannon uses magnetically driven projectiles.

ItemType.name: Browning laser cannon
ItemType.description: Browning lasers are old weapons that were retired from the market beacause they used faulty capacitors.

ItemType.name: Browning orange laser
ItemType.description: Browning lasers are old weapons that were retired from the market beacause they used faulty capacitors.

ItemType.name: Browning blue laser
ItemType.description: Browning lasers are old weapons that were retired from the market beacause they used faulty capacitors.

ItemType.name: Browning purple laser
ItemType.description: Browning lasers are old weapons that were retired from the market beacause they used faulty capacitors.

ItemType.name: McMillan-Mauser magic cannon
ItemType.description: The McMillan-Mauser was trying to compete against the Resiermesser Akan600 by developing autotracking ammo. Commonwealth however have driven the market in favor of Resiermesser.

ItemType.name: McMillan-Mauser magic launcher
ItemType.description: The McMillan-Mauser was trying to compete against the Resiermesser Akan600 by developing autotracking ammo. Commonwealth however have driven the market in favor of Resiermesser.

ItemType.name: MM magic shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the McMillan-Mauser magic cannon. Each shell has limited tracking capabilities. This is the standard shell.

ItemType.name: MM fast magic shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the McMillan-Mauser magic launcher only. Each shell has limited tracking capabilities. This version is lighter but reach 80% of lightspeed.

ItemType.name: MM jacketed magic shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the McMillan-Mauser magic launcher only. This shell is double jacketed for more impact damage.

ItemType.name: Fragmenting MM magic shell
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the McMillan-Mauser magic launcher. This version fragments on impact.

ItemType.name: Linebaugh culverin
ItemType.description: The culverin is a small caliber cannon with a high fire rate.

ItemType.name: Linebaugh explosive culverin
ItemType.description: The culverin is a small caliber cannon with a high fire rate. This version uses high explosive shells that are difficult to stop.

ItemType.name: Linebaugh heavy culverin
ItemType.description: The culverin is a small caliber cannon with a high fire rate. This version is modified to use larger projectiles.

ItemType.name: Linebaugh demi-culverin
ItemType.description: The culverin is a small caliber cannon with a high fire rate. This version is lighter.

ItemType.name: Linebaugh lightspeed culverin
ItemType.description: The culverin is a small caliber cannon with a high fire rate. This version launches its projectiles at 99.9% of lightspeed, consumes more power, but it deals more damage to structure scale objects.

ItemType.name: Linebaugh dual culverin
ItemType.description: The culverin is a small caliber cannon with a high fire rate. This version is dual.

ItemType.name: Grendel Minotaur Howitzer
ItemType.description: Grendel produces exotic howitzers, they're effectiveness is questionable.

ItemType.name: Grendel Griffin Howitzer
ItemType.description: Grendel produces exotic howitzers, they're effectiveness is questionable.

ItemType.name: Grendel Drake Howitzer
ItemType.description: Grendel produces exotic howitzers, they're effectiveness is questionable.

ItemType.name: Grendel Were-Howitzer
ItemType.description: Grendel produces exotic howitzers, they're effectiveness is questionable.

ItemType.name: Dreyse needle-gun
ItemType.description: Paul Dreyse the 72th opened a weapon factory and entered the weapon market like his ancestor.

ItemType.name: Dreyse heavy needle-gun
ItemType.description: Paul Dreyse the 72th opened a weapon factory and entered the weapon market like his ancestor.

ItemType.name: Napoleon Launcher
ItemType.description: The Napoleon is a 6 muzzled missile launcher, each ammo cartridge contains 6 mini missiles that automatically track on the nearest target.

ItemType.name: Napoleon missile
ItemType.description: The Napoleon is a non military multi missile compatible with the Napoleon Launcher. Each cartridge contains in 6 mini missiles.

ItemType.name: Mosin-Nagant Supercannon
ItemType.description: The Mosin-Nagant Supercannon is a massive thermocannon, however each cannon has only 50 shells, and cannot be recharged. Each projectile is fragmenting and autotargeting.

ItemType.name: Clustertronix laser cannon
ItemType.description: Clustertronix specializes in uncommon high powered lasers.

ItemType.name: Zastava FASOR beam
ItemType.description: Zastava produces this long-range frequency addition laser. Besides the range, it's more expensive and slower than a turbolaser.
